name: Conversational Gen AI Contract Query Platform
description: Multi-agent AI platform that automates contract intelligence, enabling fast and accurate information retrieval from thousands of contracts using collaborative AI agents for extraction, knowledge management, and compliance validation.
challenge: Manual contract analysis across thousands of contracts was time-consuming and error-prone, impacting compliance tracking, decision-making, and legal risk management.
solution: Created Data Extraction Agent for automated contract analysis
Implemented Knowledge Assistant Agent for query handling
Built Security & Validation Agents for compliance
Enabled natural language to SQL/semantic search conversion
outcomes: 50% faster query resolution for legal teams
